Summary



IndusInd Bank seals deal to acquire Bharat Financial InclusionCadila Healthcare gets final U.S. FDA nod for Allopurinol tabletsGodrej Agrovet to start trading on BSE/NSE after IPOEarnings reaction to watch: Reliance Industries, Gruh Finance, Avenue Supermarts






The Singapore-traded SGX Nifty, an early indicator of Nifty 50 Index’s performance in India, gained 0.33 percent to 10,244 as of 7:30 a.m.





Here’s a quick look at all that could influence equities today.https://t.co/T1OzP2saqQ— BloombergQuint (@BloombergQuint) October 16, 2017






Here are the stocks to watch out for in today’s session:
title: Stocks To Watch: Avenue Supermarts,  Bharat Financial, IndusInd Bank, Reliance Industries
